document.full_text: the recent hacker attack at sony corp and other corporate data breaches are attracting more class-action lawyers eager to score a payday, though huge monetary settlements may be elusive.
document.title: lawyers take aim at sony hack, may miss on payout
lines_and_colors: the recent hacker attack at sony corp and other corporate data breaches are attracting more class-action lawyers eager to score a payday, though huge monetary settlements may be elusive.
